T02D3140:25a-36: rang nyid sgrub pa'i grogs dang ldan //
T02D3140:25a-37: tsandan dkar po bsres pa yi //
T02D3140:25a-38: s'a lu btags pas spang bar bya //
T02D3140:25a-39: tshangs pa'i thig ni dag pa gnyis //
T02D3140:25a-40: 'khor lo'i tshang ni gang yin pa //
T02D3140:25a-41: de yi nyis 'gyur gdab par bya //
T02D3140:25a-42: de yi phyed du rtsa ba'i thig //
T02D3140:25a-44: tshangs pa'i thig gi rtse mo'i pha rol du padma'i ge sar dang /
T02D3140:25a-46: rdo rje dang 'od kyi phreng ba rnams kyi thig zlum po'o //
T02D3140:25a-48: khor yug gi ni nang du yang //
T02D3140:25a-49: srid du sgo yi bcu drug go //
T02D3140:25a-50: zhes bshad pa ni ge sar gyi re kh'a nas brtsams nas khor yug tu 'dod do //
T02D3140:25a-51: de ji ltar rigs te ge sar dang 'dab ma dang /
T02D3140:25a-52: chos 'byung rnams ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ma 'brel la /
T02D3140:25b-0: rdo rje phreng ba'i tshul can rdo rje'i rab ni khor yug @25b du bshad do //
T02D3140:25b-1: de ltar yang 'phags pa klu'i zhal snga nas /
T02D3140:25b-2: rta babs rdo rje'i rtse mo can //
T02D3140:25b-3: de yi phyi rol khor yug ste //
T02D3140:25b-4: rdo rje'i phreng ba 'od bzang ldan //
T02D3140:25b-6: 'dis ni rdo rje phreng ba nyid //
T02D3140:25b-7: khor yug 'od bzang ldan zhes gsal bar brjod do //

T02D3140:25b-13: gal te de ltar na de ni legs par brjod

T02D3140:25b-19: de ltar 'dir padma'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa nyid la der btags pa legs so //
T02D3140:25b-21: brtan g-yo'i bdag nyid stong par bsgoms nas su //

T02D3140:25b-23: ye shes sa gzhi byin gyis brlab //
T02D3140:25b-24: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D3140:25b-25: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D3140:25b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa nas //
T02D3140:25b-27: dkyil 'khor bzhi bsdus rdo rje yis //
T02D3140:25b-28: sa yi cha yi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D3140:25b-29: der ni bh'um yig las byung ba'i //
T02D3140:25b-30: gzhal yas khang bar rnam par bsgom //
T02D3140:25b-32: 'dir ye shes sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i khams ni chos 'byung ngo //
T02D3140:25b-34: der gnas pa'i rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi 'dres par gyur pas /
T02D3140:25b-35: sa'i cha sna tshogs rdo rje'i ngo bor bskyed nas /
T02D3140:25b-36: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bh'um las gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D3140:25b-37: de nas 'dir padma med par sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes pa ni cher 'khrul lo //
T02D3140:25b-38: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni sgo'i tshad bcu gnyis so //
T02D3140:25b-39: de'i rab rnams kyi srid du so sor sgo gnyis so //
T02D3140:25b-40: de la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du sgo'i tshad brgyad do //

T02D3140:31b-45: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi padma'i phreng bas bskor
T02D3140:31b-46: ba'i gru bzhi pa zur bzhi sgo la phyogs ba'am
T02D3140:32a-0: padma'i rnam pa'o // rta mchog gi ral gri'i phreng bas bskor @32a * //
T02D3140:32a-3: gzhal yas khang thams cad du yang rang rang la
T02D3140:32a-4: ltos nas rtsa ba'i thig dang sgo dang cha chung
T02D3140:32a-5: gi tshad rnams rig par bya'o //
T02D3140:32a-6: 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3140:32a-7: gzhal yas khang chen po'i cha chung gi tshad kyis
T02D3140:32a-8: tshangs thig nas gang cha chung bzhi pa'i bar gzhan
T02D3140:32a-9: cha chung bzhi pa'i bar dang bcas pa de cha
T02D3140:32a-10: chung bcu gnyis su byas la /
T02D3140:32a-11: mdun dang rgyab dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi mtha' rnams
T02D3140:32a-12: su so sor cha gnyis kyi nang du rtsa ba'i
T02D3140:32a-13: thig cha brgyad kyi tshad du gdab po //
T02D3140:32a-14: de dang bstun pa'i sgo'i cha chung gis sgo khyud
T02D3140:32a-15: la sogs ba'i thig dang mda' yab kyi thig gi
T02D3140:32a-17: de nas phyi rol du dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha
T02D3140:32a-18: chung gi tshad kyis cha chung gnyis kyi bar dor
T02D3140:32a-19: nas tshangs thig la thig skud bzung nas tshad kyi
T02D3140:32a-20: don du thig zlum po gcig go //
T02D3140:32a-21: 'di'i cha mnyam pa lnga byas nas cha re re'i
T02D3140:32a-22: dbus las byung ba'i tshangs thig ni dkyil 'khor chen
T02D3140:32a-23: po'i cha chung gi tshad kyi cha chung brgyad pa'o
T02D3140:32a-24: // de'i dbus su de bzhin du tshangs thig gzhan no //
T02D3140:32a-25: gnyis ba 'di re re zhing cha chung gnyis su
T02D3140:32a-26: byas la zhes pa la sogs pa nas rab tu
T02D3140:32a-27: gdab bo zhes pa'i mthar thug pa de ma thag
T02D3140:32a-29: dkyil 'khor drug po 'di rnams la zur thig rnams kyang gdab par bya'o //
T02D3140:32a-30: 'di rnams kyi tshangs thig nas phyi ngos su lta
T02D3140:32a-31: ba'i cha chung gsum gyi bar spangs par thig zlum
T02D3140:32a-32: po gcig go // de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma'i
T02D3140:32a-33: cha chung drug spangs bar thig zlum po gcig go
T02D3140:32a-34: po gcig go // // de'i phyi ngos su phyogs
T02D3140:32a-35: dang mtshams rnams su cha chung drug pa'i padma brgyad
T02D3140:32a-36: po gcig go // // do // de nas thig
T02D3140:32a-37: zlum po gcig go / de'i phyi ngos su cha
T02D3140:32a-38: chung gcig dor bar thig zlum po'o //
T02D3140:32a-39: de nas thams cad du tshad ba dang zur thig dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D3140:32a-40: de lta bu ni 'dir gdab pa'i khyad par ro //
T02D3140:32a-41: gzhan po brang bdun pa la sogs pa'i gzhal yas
T02D3140:32a-42: khang gi khyad par rnams kyang bshad pa'i rjes su
T02D3140:32a-43: 'brangs te dpag la mkhas pa rnams kyis thig gdab
T02D3140:32a-44: pa'o // dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni
T02D3140:32a-45: 'dir brjod pa'i rgyud gzhan ma lus par gsungs pa'i
T02D3140:32a-46: cho ga rnams las nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs
T02D3140:32a-47: pa 'dul ba'i don du bya ba mi mthun bar
T02D3140:32b-0: pa'o // gsungs so // de'i phyir @32b rdzogs pa'i
T02D3140:32b-1: rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D3140:32b-2: 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod pa thams cad
T02D3140:32b-3: grub par bya ba'i phyir sku sna tshogs pas dkyil
T02D3140:32b-4: 'khor ma lus ba'i dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ro
T02D3140:32b-5: zhes lhag pa'i mos pa bstan bas /
T02D3140:32b-6: rgyud gzhan gyi cho gas kyang rab gnas la sogs
T02D3140:32b-7: ba bya ba mi 'gal te mngon bar 'dod pa
T02D3140:32b-8: sgrub par byed do zhes pas /
T02D3140:32b-9: dus kyi 'khor lo'i bya ba spros pa dor nas
T02D3140:32b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa tsam brjod par bya'o
T02D3140:32b-11: // rdul tshon bri ba tsam ni 'chad par 'gyur
T02D3140:32b-12: ba'i rdul tshon bri ba'i skabs su brjod par bya'o
T02D3140:32b-13: // // 'dir slob dpon gyi mthe bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi khru yin la ;
T02D3140:32b-15: de nyis 'gyur srid du khru brgyad pa'i tshangs thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
T02D3140:32b-16: de nas de bzhin du zur thig gnyis so //
T02D3140:32b-17: thig skud ni sbom du slob dpon gyi nas kyi tshad do //
T02D3140:32b-18: de la thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i drug cha
T02D3140:32b-19: ni mthe bong phyed kyi chad de cha chung du
T02D3140:32b-21: de la tshangs thig gi lte bar gtso bo'i padma'i
T02D3140:32b-22: lte ba'i don du tshangs thig las phyi ngos su
T02D3140:32b-23: cha chung gnyis dor nas tshangs thig gzhan gyi steng
T02D3140:32b-24: du bzung ste thig zlum po gcig gdab po //
T02D3140:32b-25: de nas 'dab ma'i cha chung bzhi dor nas thig gcig gdab bo //
T02D3140:32b-26: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cha chung spangs par thig gcig go //
T02D3140:32b-27: de nas lha'i padma'i cha chung bzhi dor bar thig gcig go //
T02D3140:32b-28: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cha chung gcig dor bar thig gcig go //
T02D3140:32b-29: thig bzhi po 'di rnams ni zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
T02D3140:32b-30: 'dir lha'i cha chung bzhi'i dbus su ni padma'i cha chung bzhi pa'o //
T02D3140:32b-31: de'i 'gram gnyis su ka ba gnyis te rgyar cha chung re re srid du cha chung bzhi'o //
T02D3140:32b-32: de gnyis kyi 'gram du rgyar cha chung gsum pa'i bum pa gnyis te de ltar ring ba'o //
T02D3140:32b-33: de dag gi 'gram du de bzhin du ka ba gnyis so //
T02D3140:32b-34: de nas zur thig gi mthar thug pa'i thig mtha'
T02D3140:32b-35: ma las phyi ngos su cha chung bdun gyi bar
T02D3140:32b-37: de nas lha snam gyi cha chung bzhi pa'i bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
T02D3140:32b-38: de nas cha chung gcig dor nas rtsa ba'i thig ste zur thig gi bar du'o //
T02D3140:32b-39: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rtsa ba'i thig gi mthar thug pa kho na'o //
T02D3140:32b-40: de ltar gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3140:33a-1: g-yon du rtsa ba'i thig cha chung gsum gsum sngon
T02D3140:33a-2: bzhin phyi bas sgo ni cha chung drug pa ste
T02D3140:33a-4: sgo khyud dang 'gram dang logs gsum gyi tshad ni sgo dang mnyam mo //
T02D3140:33a-5: rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar rtsig pa'i thig ste //
T02D3140:33a-6: zur thig las 'thon nas sgo khyud dang 'gram dang
T02D3140:33a-7: logs kyi rjes su 'gro bas gsum kyog po mda'
T02D3140:33a-8: yab kyi thig gi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D3140:33a-9: de'i glor rta babs kyi ka ba'i cha chung phyed
T02D3140:33a-10: dang gnyis dor bar mda' yab kyi thig la rtse
T02D3140:33a-12: nang gi dpangs su cha chud phyed dang brgyad pa'o //
T02D3140:33a-13: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi'i thig las phyi ngos su
T02D3140:33a-14: stegs bu'i cha chung gsum gyi bar dor nas thig
T02D3140:33a-15: go // de nas rin po che'i pha gu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar thig go //
T02D3140:33a-16: de nas dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'i cha chung gsum dor bar thig go //
T02D3140:33a-17: de nas rin chen shar bu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar thig go //
T02D3140:33a-18: de nas mda' yab kyi snam bu'i cha chung phyed
T02D3140:33a-19: dang gnyis dor bar mda' yab kyi thig ste zur
T02D3140:33a-20: thig nas zur thig gzhan gyi bar du ring ba'o
T02D3140:33a-21: // stegs bu'i thig la sogs pa bzhi ni thig gzhan gyi bar du'o //
T02D3140:33a-22: 'dir ni ka ba gcig gi steng nas ka ba
T02D3140:33a-23: gnyis pa'i steng du son pa'i thig ni gdung mtshon
T02D3140:33a-25: 'di'i nang du mda' yab rnams bri bar mi bya'o //
T02D3140:33a-26: ka ba'i steng du rta babs ni sgo'i tshad las steng du sum 'gyur ro //
T02D3140:33a-27: de yang rim pa gsum pa ste /
T02D3140:33a-28: dang po ni cha chung drug go //
T02D3140:33a-29: gnyis pa ni cha chung phyed dang lnga'o //
T02D3140:33a-30: gsum pa ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi'o //

T02D3140:33a-34: steng du cha chung gcig pa'i snam bu cha chung
T02D3140:33a-35: nyi shu rtsa bzhir ring ba'o //
T02D3140:33a-36: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung
T02D3140:33a-37: ba'i snam bu cha chung bcu drug tu ring ba'o
T02D3140:33a-38: // de'i steng du dbus su cha chung bzhi pa

T02D3140:33a-42: de'i glor slar yang ka ba cha chung gcig pa'o //
T02D3140:33a-43: de dag gi gzhogs su rta babs kyi ka ba'i
T02D3140:33a-44: steng du mche ba can gyi dbang po dag mnan
T02D3140:33a-45: pa'i mgo bo'i steng du bteg pa'i seng ge dag
T02D3140:33b-0: go // de dag gi mgo dang @33b ka ba
T02D3140:33b-1: bzhi'i steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha
T02D3140:33b-2: chung bco brgyad du ring ba'o //
T02D3140:33b-3: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
T02D3140:33b-4: de'i steng du cha chung gsum pa'i snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
T02D3140:33b-5: de la so sor bzhi chas nyung ba'i cha chung gcig pa'i ka ba bzhi'o //
T02D3140:33b-6: ka ba'i bar rnams su so sor cha chung gsum pa'i lha'i gnas gsum mo //
T02D3140:33b-7: phyi'i ka ba'i glo dag tu gdung 'degs pa'i lha mo gnyis so //
T02D3140:33b-8: de dag gi mgo gnyis dang ka ba rnams kyi
T02D3140:33b-9: steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung
T02D3140:33b-11: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i snam bu cha chung brgyad du ring ba'o //
T02D3140:33b-12: de'i steng du cha chung gnyis pa'i snam bu cha chung brgyad du ring ba'o //
T02D3140:33b-13: de nas so sor cha chung phyed pa'i ka ba bzhi'o //
T02D3140:33b-14: ka ba'i bar rnams su lha'i gnas gsum ste re re zhing cha chung gnyis pa'o //
T02D3140:33b-15: phyi'i ka ba'i glo dag tu gdung 'degs pa'i lha mo gnyis so //
T02D3140:33b-16: de'i steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
T02D3140:33b-17: de'i steng du har mi ste srid du cha chung brgyad po'o //
T02D3140:33b-19: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba'i gnas so //
T02D3140:33b-20: de ltar snam bu thams cad kyi rtse mo la
T02D3140:33b-21: dril bu dang mda' yab dang me long dang rgyal
T02D3140:33b-22: mtshan dang bad na rnams so //
T02D3140:33b-23: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba'i thig nas phyi ngos su gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3140:33b-24: de'i phyogs re rer cha chung bcu gnyis ba'i gnas
T02D3140:33b-25: ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs
T02D3140:33b-26: pa nas mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa'i snam bu
T02D3140:33b-28: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bdun pa'i bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
T02D3140:33b-29: de nas cha chung bzhi pa'i lha snam dor nas thig gcig go //
T02D3140:33b-30: snam bu 'di la cha chung bzhi pa'i padma rnams te /

T02D3140:33b-32: gyi rta babs kyi 'og tu gnas pa ni rim
T02D3140:33b-33: pa gnyis pa'i myos pas bsrung ba la sogs pa'i
T02D3140:33b-34: cha chung bzhi pa'i gnas su ka ba gnyis kyi
T02D3140:33b-35: cha chung phyed pa bsnur nas bri bar bya'o //
T02D3140:33b-36: de nas lha snam gyi thig las phyi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar rtsa ba'i thig go //
T02D3140:33b-37: thig gsum po 'di zur thig gi mthar thug bar ring ba'o //
T02D3140:34a-0: rtsa ba'i thig la tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung drug @34a * //
T02D3140:34a-1: drug sngon bzhin phyi bas sgo cha chung bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T02D3140:34a-2: de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa nas rta babs
T02D3140:34a-3: kyi mthar thug pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3140:34a-4: sgo khyud la sogs pa las nyis 'gyur du 'gyur
T02D3140:34a-5: ro // gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rtsa ba'i thig las phyi ngos su sku'i dkyil 'khor ro ;
T02D3140:34a-6: / de'i phyogs re re cha chung nyi shu rtsa
T02D3140:34a-7: bzhi'i gnas ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa
T02D3140:34a-8: la sogs pa mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa'i snam
T02D3140:34a-10: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gcig dor nas thig go //
T02D3140:34a-11: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gnyis kyi lha snam dor nas thig go //
T02D3140:34a-12: lha snam 'di la padma bcu gnyis te re re zhing cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D3140:34a-13: de la cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i padma cha bdun byas nas dbus kyi cha ni lte ba'o //
T02D3140:34a-14: g-yas dang g-yon gyi cha dag ni 'dab ma bzhi'o //
T02D3140:34a-15: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du brgyad do //
T02D3140:34a-16: de'i g-yas dang g-yon dag bcu drug go //
T02D3140:34a-17: de ltar dkyil 'khor gsum rnams kyi 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
T02D3140:34a-18: lha snam gyi thig las rtsi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar rtsa ba'i thig go //
T02D3140:34a-19: thig gsum po 'di srid du zur thig gi bar du'o //
T02D3140:34a-20: rtsa ba'i thig gi tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon
T02D3140:34a-21: dag tu cha chung bcu gnyis sngon bzhin phyi ba
T02D3140:34a-22: las sgo cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no
T02D3140:34a-23: // de nas de'i sgo khyud la sogs pa nas
T02D3140:34a-24: rta babs kyi mthar thug ba rnams gsung gi dkyil
T02D3140:34a-25: 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa nyis 'gyur te
T02D3140:34a-26: chu'i khor yug gi phyed tshun chad do //
T02D3140:34a-27: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs rnams kyi phyi
T02D3140:34a-28: rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus rnams su
T02D3140:34a-29: cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i shing rta rnams so //
T02D3140:34a-30: de nas sa'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D3140:34a-31: de'i phyi ngos su chu'i khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3140:34a-32: de nas me'i 'khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3140:34a-33: de nas rlung gi khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3140:34a-34: rlung gi khor yug las phyi ngos su nam mkha'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis so //
T02D3140:34a-35: khor yug de'i phyi ngos su 'od zer gyi phreng ba cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3140:34a-36: sa'i khor yug la sogs pa drug po 'di rnams rang rang gi dang por thig zlum po'o //
T02D3140:34a-37: 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar yang ste thig zlum po bdun no //
T02D3140:34a-38: de lta bu 'di ni gtso bo thugs rdo rje'i
T02D3140:34b-0: dkyil 'khor gsum @34b gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D3140:34b-1: ro // 'di'i thig skud la ni khru brgyad de
T02D3140:34b-2: sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du'o zhes pa
T02D3140:34b-4: gang gi tshe thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang /
T02D3140:34b-5: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung bco brgyad yongs su brtags te /
T02D3140:34b-6: de'i drug cha la cha chung gi tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe /

T02D3140:34b-8: pa nas 'od kyi phreng ba'i mthar thug par cha
T02D3140:34b-10: de'i tshe gtso bo thugs rdo rje dkyil 'khor gsum

T02D3140:34b-13: yug gi thog ma'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa

T02D3140:34b-17: gtso bo ste / de las gzhan pa'i lha la
T02D3140:34b-18: sogs pa'i bkod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin du
T02D3140:34b-19: gtso bo ste / ste / gang gi tshe yang /
T02D3140:34b-20: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dang /
T02D3140:34b-22: de nyis 'gyur gsum pa yin pa de'i tshe khru
T02D3140:34b-23: bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid gsung

T02D3140:34b-26: sa'i khor yug gi dang po'i bar du'o zhes pa phyogs gsum pa'o//
T02D3140:34b-27: gang gi tshe dang por brjod pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang /
T02D3140:34b-28: dang por brjod pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad
T02D3140:34b-29: bsdoms nas sgo cha chung sum cur yongs su brtags
T02D3140:34b-30: te / de'i drug cha la cha chung du 'dogs pa de'i tshe /
T02D3140:34b-31: cha chung des gtso bo'i lte ba la sogs pa
T02D3140:34b-32: nas 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar thug par cha
T02D3140:34b-34: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje yang sku rdo rje'i gnas su bya'o //
T02D3140:34b-35: sku rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
T02D3140:34b-36: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin te /

T02D3140:41a-8: sprul gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang /

T02D3140:41a-50: rdo rje dril bu rnams so //

T02D3140:41b-10: tshil gyis bkang ba la gnas pa'i sbrul dang /

T02D3140:41b-13: khrag dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i stag dang chang gi snod rnams so //
T02D3140:41b-14: rim pa gnyis pa'i mtshams rnams su gling bu ma

T02D3140:41b-24: gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi nyi ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma rnams so //
T02D3140:41b-25: dbus kyi 'od zer gyi phyi ngos su sngar bzhin du bum pa rnams so //

T02D3140:41b-38: 'dir gri gug bzhi ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3140:41b-39: mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D3140:41b-40: phyi'i dkar mo la sogs pa bco brgyad po rnams kyi zla ba dang /

T02D3140:41b-42: gling bum la sogs pa brgyad med pa ni lhag
T02D3140:41b-43: ma lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyi zla ba
T02D3140:41b-45: mkha' spyod ma'i mtshan ma ni dkar mo'i phyi ngos so //
T02D3140:41b-46: ro langs ma'i phyi ngos su sa spyod ma'o //

T02D3140:42a-0: khyad par ni zla ba la yu ba dang bcas pa'i autpa @42a * //

T02D3140:42a-14: rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su me tog ma dang /
T02D3140:42a-17: dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi za ma tog dang /
T02D3140:42a-21: shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams su gling bu

T02D3140:42a-33: 'di nyid kho na bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go //
T02D3140:42a-34: gzhan rdo rje bdud rtsi gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi

T02D3140:42a-37: rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte
T02D3140:42a-38: bar nyi ma la rdo rje sngon po kha gyes
T02D3140:42a-39: rig par bya'o // pa'o // shar la sogs pa

T02D3140:42b-13: dgu'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la

T02D3140:43a-24: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la padma'i snod rnams so //

T02D3140:43a-37: lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang /

T02D3140:43a-57: gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang /

T02D3140:44a-1: rnams la kha tv'am ga rnams kyi phyi ngos su

T02D3140:51a-62: 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor la mtshan

T02D3140:51a-64: pa ste / sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D3140:51b-0: gzhal yas @51b khang drug po rnams kyi grva rnams
T02D3140:51b-1: su sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i thod pa rnams
T02D3140:51b-2: so // de la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi padma la rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D3140:51b-3: mtshams kyi padma rnams la mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D3140:51b-6: gzugs can ma rnams kyi cang te'u rnams so //
T02D3140:51b-7: 'dir dgod pa'i rim pa ni shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su g-yon skor dang /
T02D3140:51b-8: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g-yas skor ro //
T02D3140:51b-9: sgo'i padma rnams la thod pa'i dum bu dang /
T02D3140:51b-10: rab tu gtum mo dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-12: gtum ba'i mig can ma dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-15: mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma dang /
T02D3140:51b-16: sna chen ma dag gi rdo rje bzhi'o //
T02D3140:51b-17: khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3140:51b-18: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du dbus kyi padma la 'khor lo dang /
T02D3140:51b-19: sgo'i padma rnams la lha dgra dang /
T02D3140:51b-20: dpa' bo'i blo can ma dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-24: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-26: shing grib ma dag gi 'khor lo rnams so //
T02D3140:51b-27: khor yug gi dbus su 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3140:51b-28: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su rin po che'o //
T02D3140:51b-29: sgo'i chu skyes rnams la myu gu can dang /
T02D3140:51b-30: ae ra pa ti dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-31: rdo rje ral pa can dang /
T02D3140:51b-36: chang 'thung ma dag gi rin po che rnams so //
T02D3140:51b-37: khor yug gi dbus su padma rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3140:51b-38: padma mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su padma'o //
T02D3140:51b-39: sgo'i padma rnams la shin tu bzang po dang /
T02D3140:51b-40: lha mo sngo bsangs ma dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-42: shin tu bzang mo dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-46: bya gdong ma rnams kyi padma rnams so //
T02D3140:51b-47: khor yug gi dbus su padma'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3140:51b-48: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D3140:51b-49: sgo'i padma rnams la stobs po che dang /
T02D3140:51b-50: 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dag dang /
T02D3140:51b-52: du ma skyes ma dag dang /
T02D3140:52a-2: 'khor lo'i go cha ma dag gi rdo rje rnams so //
T02D3140:52a-3: khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3140:52a-4: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D3140:52a-5: sgo'i padma rnams la he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo dag dang /
T02D3140:52a-6: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02D3140:52a-11: brtson 'grus chen mo dag gi sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so //
T02D3140:52a-12: khor yug gi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3140:52a-13: gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams la khva gdong ma dang ;
T02D3140:52a-16: phag gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02D3140:52a-20: mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang /
T02D3140:52a-21: gshin rje pho nya ma dang /
T02D3140:52a-22: gshin rje mche ba ma dang /
T02D3140:52a-23: gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi me long dang ;
T02D3140:52a-27: bum pa rnams ni ji ltar rigs par ro //
T02D3140:52a-28: de ltar brjod pa'i rjes su 'brangs te dkyil 'khor
T02D3140:52a-29: gzhan rnams la rdul tshon dgye pa yang shes par
T02D3140:52a-30: bya ste / gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bstan to //
T02D3140:52a-31: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni tshon gyi
T02D3140:52a-32: kha dog gi rim pa bshad pa dag dang phal
T02D3140:52a-34: rdul tshon gyi kha dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D3140:52a-35: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis
T02D3140:52a-36: pa'i bar gyi nang gis thams cad ni nag po'o
T02D3140:52a-38: gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi shar gyis thams cad ni nag po'o //
T02D3140:52a-43: rin chen snam bu ni dmar po ste /
T02D3140:52a-44: de la rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'o //
T02D3140:52a-45: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i sa ni nag po ste /
T02D3140:52a-46: de la dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa ni dkar po'o//
T02D3140:52a-47: sa nag po la rin chen shar bu dkar po'o //
T02D3140:52a-48: sa nag po la mda' yab rnams ser po'o //
T02D3140:52a-49: rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ser po'o //
T02D3140:52a-50: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ni gco bo'i padma ljang gu'o //
T02D3140:52a-51: zhi ba la sogs pa la ni kha dog dkar po la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3140:52b-0: ka ba bcu drug @52b ni nag po ste /
T02D3140:52b-1: shar du ral gri nag po dang /
T02D3140:52b-2: lhor rin po che dmar po dang /
T02D3140:52b-3: nub du 'khor lo ser po dang /
T02D3140:52b-4: byang du padma dkar po rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-5: bum pa brgyad ni padma la gnas shing dkar po ste /
T02D3140:52b-7: thams cad du padma'i gdan gyi sum cha ni lte ba'o //
T02D3140:52b-8: rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa ni ljang gu'o //
T02D3140:52b-10: rtsig pa'i re kh'a gsum ni nang nas brtsams nas dkar po dang /
T02D3140:52b-12: de rnams kyi sa ni cha dgur byas te /
T02D3140:52b-13: de la cha re dor nas cha gnyis la re kh'a so so bya'o //
T02D3140:52b-14: sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su rdo rje dang rin po ches spras pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-15: rta babs bcu gnyis ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-16: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha snam dkar po'o //
T02D3140:52b-17: de'i padma brgyad ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang bral ba ste /
T02D3140:52b-18: phyogs rnams su dmar ba dang /
T02D3140:52b-20: re kh'a lnga'i kha dag ni nang nas brtsams te ljang gu dang /
T02D3140:52b-25: de rnams kyis cha bco lngar byas te der snga ma bzhin re kh'a bya'o //
T02D3140:52b-26: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha sna ma ni dkar po'o //
T02D3140:52b-27: de'i padma rnams ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang bral ba'o //
T02D3140:52b-28: re kh'a lnga ni sku'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no ;
T02D3140:52b-29: / rta babs kyi ka ba rnams kyi 'og gi
T02D3140:52b-30: stegs bu'i gnas rnams su sprul gyi gdan rnams te
T02D3140:52b-31: / so sor cha chung bcu gnyis so //
T02D3140:52b-32: de la shar gyi phyogs su nag po zlum po gnyis kyi steng du rgyal mtshan gnyis so //
T02D3140:52b-33: lhor gru gsum dmar po gnyis la bkra shis kyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-34: nub tu gra bzhi ser po gnyis la rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-35: byang du zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa dkar po gnyis la padmas mtshan pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-36: shar gyi g-yas kyi zlum po'i g-yas su klu'i rgyal po rgyal ba zhes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-37: nub kyi g-yon gyi gru bzhi pa'i g-yon du rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o //
T02D3140:52b-38: shar gyi rta babs kyi rim pa dang po'i myos
T02D3140:52b-39: pa bsrung ba'i steng gi dbus kyi gru bzhi pa
T02D3140:52b-40: la chos kyi 'khor lo nag po /
T02D3140:52b-41: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du ri dags dang re dags mo nag po'o //
T02D3140:52b-42: lhor bum pa bzang po dmar po'o //
T02D3140:52b-43: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du dung dang /
T02D3140:53a-1: byang chub kyi shing ser po'o //
T02D3140:53a-2: de'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu mi'am ci dang mi'am ci mo ser po'o //
T02D3140:53a-3: byang du rnga bo che dkar po ste de'i g-yas
T02D3140:53a-4: dang g-yon du dbyug pa dang tho ba dkar po'o
T02D3140:53a-5: // mda' yab dang sa'i khor yug gi dbus kyis ni nag po'o //
T02D3140:53a-6: der ji ltar mdzes par mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D3140:53a-7: sa'i khor yug ni ser po'o //
T02D3140:53a-8: der dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba nya ba'i
T02D3140:53a-9: dkyil 'khor 'char ba cha chung bcu gnyis pa dang
T02D3140:53a-10: / bden bral du nub bzhin pa'i nyi ma cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D3140:53a-13: / rlung gi khor yug nag po'o //
T02D3140:53a-14: me dang rlung gi khor yug de dag gi dbus
T02D3140:53a-15: su so sor cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i rtsibs brgyad
T02D3140:53a-16: pa'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo brgyad de /
T02D3140:53a-17: phyogs su dmar po rnams dang /
T02D3140:53a-18: mtshams su dkar po rnams so //
T02D3140:53a-19: shar gyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su stong pa'i dkyil
T02D3140:53a-20: 'khor nub kyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su yang stong
T02D3140:53a-22: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis 'dri ba ni sgrub thabs kyi le'ur gsungs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D3140:53a-23: bcu char la yang mtshan ma ni gri gug go //
T02D3140:53a-24: rlung gi khor yug la mtshan ma sna tshogs pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D3140:53a-25: 'dir 'dod pa spyod pa ni ma yin no //
T02D3140:53a-26: nam mkha'i khor yug ni nag po'o //
T02D3140:53a-27: de'i logs gnyis su cha chung gsum gsum dor la der re kh'a zlum skor gnyis so //
T02D3140:53a-28: dbus kyi cha chung drug la ni rdo rje phreng ba ljang gur bya'o //
T02D3140:53a-29: 'od zer 'bar ba rnams ni kha dog rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D3140:53a-30: yang nang gi dkyil 'khor du shar phyogs su tshon
T02D3140:53a-31: nag po'i dpangs su nas kyi bzhi cha gcig go
T02D3140:53a-32: // lho'i dmar po ni gnyis so //
T02D3140:53a-33: nub kyi ser po ni bzhi'o //
T02D3140:53a-34: byang gi dkar po ni gsum mo //
T02D3140:53a-35: rtsig pa'i re kh'a rnams kyi dpangs su rdul tshon ser po sum 'gyur ro //
T02D3140:53a-36: rdo rje phreng ba rnams kyang ngo //
T02D3140:53a-37: re kh'a gzhan ni tshon ser po las nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D3140:53a-38: padma rnams ni snam bu las nyis 'gyur gyis so //
T02D3140:53a-39: nyi zla dag ni chu skyes kyi re kh'a las so //
T02D3140:53a-40: de ltar brjod pa'i dpangs las gsung gi dkyil 'khor la dpangs rnams ni nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D3140:53a-41: de rnams las nyis 'gyur ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D3140:53b-0: @53b mda' yab las phyi'i mchod pa'i sa la nas gcig go //
T02D3140:53b-1: sa la sogs pa'i khor yug dang re kh'a zlum
T02D3140:53b-2: skor gnyis kyi dpangs ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig
T02D3140:53b-4: sa thams cad du rdul tshon gzhan dgye ba thams cad kyi nyis 'gyur gyi dbye bas mnyam pa'o //
T02D3140:53b-5: de la gtso bo'i lte bar lte ba dang mnyam
T02D3140:53b-6: pa'i dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po dang
T02D3140:53b-7: dmar po'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02D3140:53b-8: sgra gcan dang dus kyi me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3140:53b-9: du bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje
T02D3140:53b-11: shar gyi 'dab ma la spos phor nag po'o //
T02D3140:53b-14: byang du lha bshos dkar po'o //
T02D3140:53b-15: me la sogs par rnga yab nag po dang /
T02D3140:53b-19: de'i phyi ngos su dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dkar po'o //
T02D3140:53b-20: mer yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po'o //
T02D3140:53b-21: bden bral du chos kyi gand'i dmar po'o //
T02D3140:53b-22: rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o //
T02D3140:53b-23: rim pa gnyis par shar du padma dkar por nyi ma la ral gri nag po'o //
T02D3140:53b-24: mer padma dmar por zla ba la autpala sngon po'o //
T02D3140:53b-25: lhor padma dkar por nyi ma la rin po che cha dgu pa dmar po'o //
T02D3140:53b-26: bden bral du padma dmar por zla ba la padma dmar po'o //
T02D3140:53b-27: nub tu padma dkar por nyi ma la 'khor lo ser po'o //
T02D3140:53b-28: rlung du padma dmar por zla ba la 'khor lo ser po'o //
T02D3140:53b-29: byang du padma dkar por nyi ma la padma dkar po'o //
T02D3140:53b-30: dbang ldan du padma dmar por zla ba la autpala dkar po'o //
T02D3140:53b-31: rim pa gsum pa'i snam bu la sgo so so'i
T02D3140:53b-32: logs gnyis su gnyis te de ltar padma brgyad do
T02D3140:53b-33: // de la drug rnams nyi ma la'o //
T02D3140:53b-34: nub dang byang gi sgo'i g-yon dag tu zla ba gnyis so //
T02D3140:53b-35: mtshams rnams su padma dang zla ba bzhi ste de
T02D3140:53b-36: rnams su dbang ldan nas brtsams te me long dang
T02D3140:53b-41: rin po che dang rdo rje dang ro'i snod dang /
T02D3140:53b-52: ljang gu dang ser po dang /
T02D3140:54a-2: nyi mar ral gri nag po dang /
T02D3140:54a-3: lhor dbyug pa dmar po dang /
T02D3140:54a-4: nub tu padma ser po dang /
T02D3140:54a-5: byang du tho ba dkar po'o //
T02D3140:54a-6: 'dir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni padma dkar po
T02D3140:54a-7: la gnas shing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni padma
T02D3140:54a-8: dmar po la'o // shar gyi stegs bul rta babs
T02D3140:54a-9: kyi ka ba'i rtsa ba'i g-yon du dung nag po
T02D3140:54a-10: dmar po la'o // dang / g-yas su me tog sngon po'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3140:54a-11: lhor spos phor dmar po dang /
T02D3140:54a-13: nub tu cod pan ser po dang /
T02D3140:54a-15: byang du 'bras bu dkar po dang bdud rtsi dkar pos gang ba'i thod pa'i snod do //
T02D3140:54a-16: stegs bu thams cad la ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-17: shar gyi rta babs kyi mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas la dbus su gos so //
T02D3140:54a-19: nub tu rnga ba ta ha'o //
T02D3140:54a-21: gsung gi dkyil 'khor la ni shar gyi padma'i lte
T02D3140:54a-22: ba dang 'dab ma rnams la gri gug nag po
T02D3140:54a-23: rnams so // mer 'khor lo nag po rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-24: gshin rjer dbyug pa dmar po rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-25: bden bral du shakti dmar po rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-26: nub tu rdo rje ser po rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-27: rlung du tshangs pa'i dbyu gu rtse mo ser po can rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-28: byang du rtse gsum dkar po rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-29: dbang ldan du padma dkar po rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-30: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu la padma'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la mtshan ma rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-31: de la shar gyi sgo'i g-yas su ral gri rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-32: mer dpag bsam gyi shing rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-33: lho'i sgo'i g-yon du rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-35: bden bral du shakti'am yang nam dung rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-36: nub kyi sgo'i g-yon du rin po che'am /
T02D3140:54a-38: g-yas su rdo rje rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-39: rlung du kha ba rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-40: byang sgo'i g-yon du rtse gsum rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-41: g-yas su zhags pa rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-42: dbang ldan du dgra sta rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-43: shar sgo'i g-yon du 'khor lo rnams so //
T02D3140:54a-45: de'i phyi rol du rdo rje ljang gu'o //
T02D3140:54a-47: nub sgor dbyug to ser po'o //
T02D3140:54a-48: de'i phyi ngos su rtse gsum sngon po'o //
T02D3140:54a-49: byang sgor gtun shing dkar po'o //
T02D3140:54a-50: dbyug pa la sogs pa'i mchan ma 'di rnams padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3140:54b-0: gsung dang @54b sku'i dkyil 'khor dag gi phyogs kyi padma rnams ni dmar po'o //
T02D3140:54b-1: mtshams kyi padma rnams ni dkar po'o //
T02D3140:54b-2: 'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu la shar du sgo'i g-yas su autpala dang /
T02D3140:54b-6: kha tv'am ga rnams nag po'o //
T02D3140:54b-10: lho'i stegs bu la sgo'i g-yas su padma dang /
T02D3140:54b-11: ro'i snod dang dbyug pa dang shakti dang padma rnams dmar po'o //
T02D3140:54b-12: g-yon du mda' dang dgra sta dang /
T02D3140:54b-15: nub sgo'i g-yas su 'khor lo dang dri'i dung chos dang /
T02D3140:54b-19: g-yon du chos 'byung ljang gu dang /
T02D3140:54b-23: byang du sgo'i g-yas su autpala dang /
T02D3140:54b-28: g-yon du pi wang sngon po dang /
T02D3140:54b-29: tho ba dang gri gug dang /
T02D3140:54b-31: de ltar mtshan ma sum cu so drug po rnams
T02D3140:54b-32: ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu rnams la yang
T02D3140:54b-33: ngo // de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la //
T02D3140:54b-34: rnam pa thams cad du gsal bar gyur par shes nas /
T02D3140:54b-36: 'khyil ba bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i
T02D3140:54b-37: dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ngos su byugs la
T02D3140:54b-38: // de bzlas pa'i chus 'khor lo bsangs te /
T02D3140:54b-39: rdul tshon lhag ma rnams la /
T02D3140:54b-40: aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi tshon gshegs su gsol te /
T02D3140:54b-41: snod na gnas pa'i tshon rnams dben par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3140:54b-43: de nas sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i bum
T02D3140:54b-44: pa rnams g-yas skor du dgod par byas pa'i bum
T02D3140:54b-45: pa rnams g-yas skor du dgod par bya'o //
T02D3140:54b-46: de la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D3140:54b-47: bum pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la g-yas
T02D3140:54b-48: skor byas nas rdo rjer ba'i bdag nyid kyi khor
T02D3140:54b-49: yug dang / 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i sa'i phyi ngos
T02D3140:54b-50: su dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i thad ka'i gnas las
T02D3140:54b-51: cung zad g-yas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3140:54b-52: g-yon logs su go rims bzhin g-yas skor du rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3140:55a-0: las thams cad pa'i bum pa @55a * //
T02D3140:55a-2: g-yas su gzugs rdo rje ma dang /

T02D3140:55a-8: shes rab mthar byed dag gi'o //
T02D3140:55a-9: nub kyi g-yon du snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02D3140:55a-10: gos dkar mo dag gi dang /
T02D3140:55a-11: g-yas su dri rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3140:55a-13: byang gi g-yon du don yod grub pa dang /
T02D3140:55a-15: g-yas su ro rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3140:55a-16: reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3140:55a-18: kha cig ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro

T02D3140:55a-20: su'o zhes so // gzhan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D3140:55a-21: de ma thag tu khro bo rnams kyi rigs kyi
T02D3140:55a-22: yum rnams kyi ni sgo'i g-yas phyogs rnams su'o zhes

T02D3140:55a-24: te phyogs gzhan rnams su yang dgod par shes par

T02D3140:55a-26: de lta bu de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bum pa dgod pa'i tshul lo //
T02D3140:55a-27: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon du rigs kyi yum gyi de ma thag tu dang /
T02D3140:55a-28: g-yas su yang dang por byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D3140:55a-29: zur gyi khro bo rnams kyi zur rnams su'o //

T02D3140:55a-31: padma mthar byed kyi rjes la gnod mdzes kyi zhes pa khyad par ro //
T02D3140:55a-32: 'di'i rjes su 'brangs te dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la
T02D3140:55a-33: bum pa dgod pa rtogs sla bas ma spros so
T02D3140:55a-34: // grva'i bum pa rnams la sgro dang bcas pa'i mda' bzhi ste /
T02D3140:55a-35: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgod do //
T02D3140:55a-36: dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la
T02D3140:55a-37: ni phyi ngos su shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams
T02D3140:55a-39: rgyal ba'i bum pa yang shar du ste lnga pa'o //
T02D3140:55a-40: de'i steng gi rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i dung chos ni drug pa'o //
T02D3140:55a-41: de lta bu ni bum pa lnga pa'i phyogs la'o //
T02D3140:55a-42: bum pa bcu pa'i phyogs la ni phyogs brgyad du bum pa brgyad do //
T02D3140:55b-0: nub kyi bum pa las phyi ngos su sor gnyis spangs par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum @55b pa'o ;
T02D3140:55b-1: / shar gyi bum pa las phyi ngos su sor gnyis spangs par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o //
T02D3140:55b-2: de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i bum pa dung chos te bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D3140:55b-3: de ltar bum pa stong dang brgya rnams su yang
T02D3140:55b-4: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang las thams cad pa
T02D3140:55b-5: la rnam par rgyal ba chen po dung chos yin
T02D3140:55b-6: no ; / bum pa dgod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3140:55b-7: de nas dkyil 'khor la phyi ngos su phyogs bzhir
T02D3140:55b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs
T02D3140:55b-9: pa'i dam pa'i chos bzhi klog tu gzhug par bya'o
T02D3140:55b-12: tu ru skal sogs pa'i spos phor brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3140:55b-13: na bza' sna tshogs pa stong la sogs pa'am /
T02D3140:55b-14: lha so so la re re 'am /
T02D3140:55b-15: ji ltar nus pa yang rung ste /
T02D3140:55b-16: slob ma la sogs par gzhag pa dang /
T02D3140:55b-22: dril bu dang bcas pa'i rnga yab dang /
T02D3140:55b-24: lo ma dang bcas pa'i chu shing gi sdong bu'i ka ba rnams la yi ge h'um dang /
T02D3140:55b-25: bdag po'i sngags kyi bzlas pa /
T02D3140:55b-26: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes pas dbul te /
T02D3140:55b-27: gnas ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3140:55b-28: de nas khrus byas te dri zhim po'i lus stod g-yogs dang gtsug tor dang /
T02D3140:55b-29: rgyan dang bcas pas 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i chus dkyil 'khor bsangs te /
T02D3140:55b-30: yi ge gsum dang 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas rdo rje dang dril bu bzung ste /
T02D3140:55b-32: nye bar nub tu kha bltas te 'dug la 'khor
T02D3140:55b-33: lo'i dbang po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bris pa'i
T02D3140:55b-34: dkyil 'khor skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes
T02D3140:55b-36: bgegs la phur bus gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D3140:55b-37: ga 'khor dang bcas pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil
T02D3140:55b-38: 'khor gyi rang bzhin du nges par brtags nas /
T02D3140:55b-39: btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang pa //
T02D3140:55b-40: lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas//
T02D3140:55b-41: dri dang me tog brgyan byas te //
T02D3140:55b-42: de yi dbus su 'dod pa bya //
T02D3140:55b-43: yon tan ske rags m'a ma k'i //
T02D3140:55b-44: shes rab can gyis de byin rlabs //
T02D3140:55b-45: zhi ba spros byas sangs rgyas gnas //
T02D3140:55b-46: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan //
T02D3140:56a-0: zhes gsungs pas bsgrub pa'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par @56a * //
T02D3140:56a-2: de med na ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pas kyang rung ste /
T02D3140:56a-3: yang dag par bskyod pa'i dga' ba'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la zhabs bsil dang /
T02D3140:56a-4: mchod yon phul la sngon du 'gro bas rang gi
T02D3140:56a-5: nang du bcug nas 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar
T02D3140:56a-6: gyur te / rdo rje'i lam nas padmar phyung ba'i
T02D3140:56a-7: ye shes kyi lha'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid spros te
T02D3140:56a-8: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas ji lta bar
T02D3140:56a-9: zhugs par bsams nas mig dang sku la sogs pa
T02D3140:56a-10: byin gyis brlabs pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi
T02D3140:56a-11: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i
T02D3140:56a-13: lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur nas ji ltar rigs par rgyas gdab bo //
T02D3140:56a-14: rigs mi shes pa rnams la ni mi bskyod pa'am rdo rje sems dpas so //
T02D3140:56a-15: de nas lha mo spros pa rnams kyis yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pas mchod de /
T02D3140:56a-18: bla re la dar dpyangs pa dang /
T02D3140:56a-19: yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang /
T02D3140:56a-20: bldags pa dang 'jib pa dang btung ba'i nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa dang /

T02D3140:56a-27: rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnams kyis
T02D3140:56a-28: rang rang gi mchod pas mchod nas dril bud krol
T02D3140:56a-29: zhing / mi bskyod rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas bstod de /
T02D3140:56a-30: rang dang shes rab kyi me tog dang bcas pa'i
T02D3140:56a-31: byang chub kyi sems padma'i snod du bcug nas bdud
T02D3140:56a-33: de rnams bdud rtsi myang bas tshim par byas nas
T02D3140:56a-34: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du mos par byas
T02D3140:56a-35: la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang
T02D3140:56a-36: de las gzhan dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags nyi shu rtsa
T02D3140:56a-37: gcig dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3140:56a-38: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas 'byung bo thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3140:56a-39: yang na sgrub pa'i grogs po dkyil 'khor du bzhag la /
T02D3140:56a-40: phyir byung nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su
T02D3140:56a-41: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor
T02D3140:56b-0: ma'i cho gas rang gi 'dod pa'i lha @56b dang
T02D3140:56b-1: dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma dbul lo
T02D3140:56b-2: // de nas lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal du
T02D3140:56b-3: byas nas gung mo dang ming med cung zad bkug
T02D3140:56b-4: la kha la mngon du phyogs par gzung bar bya'o
T02D3140:56b-5: // // de'i rtse mos lag pa gnyis pus mo'i
T02D3140:56b-6: nang du byas nas tsog tsog pur 'dug cing mi
T02D3140:56b-7: smra bar lag pa'i ze 'bru'i chas kha la lan
T02D3140:56b-8: mang du byab cing lan gnyis dang lan gsum du
T02D3140:56b-9: rna ba'i bu ga gnyis dang /
T02D3140:56b-10: mig dag dang kha dang lag pa dag dang /
T02D3140:56b-11: lte ba dang mgo rnams la reg par bya'o zhes nye reg gi cho ga bya'o //
T02D3140:56b-12: de nas grub na lhag pa la sogs pa'i nyes
T02D3140:56b-13: pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhi ba dang dkyil
T02D3140:56b-14: 'khor tshim par bya ba'i phyir rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D3140:56b-15: byas nas khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rnal
T02D3140:56b-16: 'byor dang ldan pas me tog gi phreng ba blangs
T02D3140:56b-17: te / aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D3140:56b-18: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D3140:56b-19: aom grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D3140:56b-20: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga w'an bi dya r'a dza h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3140:56b-21: zhes dpal kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i khams gsum rnam

T02D3140:56b-23: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas rdo rje gsor zhing dril
T02D3140:56b-24: bu dkrol te rdo rje'i rkang bas de kho na
T02D3140:56b-25: bzhin du aom h'um phat ces pa dang /
T02D3140:56b-26: aom h'um a'a: phat ces pa dang /
T02D3140:56b-27: aom h'um a'a: a'a: a'a: phat ces pa dang /
T02D3140:56b-28: aom h'um ha na m'a ra ya dusht'an gh'a ta
T02D3140:56b-29: ya gh'a ta ya a'a: aa: h'um hr'i: phat ces
T02D3140:56b-30: bya ba'i sngags bzhi go rims bzhin zlos pa'i shar
T02D3140:56b-31: dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo'i slob dpon rnams dang
T02D3140:56b-32: lhan cig tu bskor ba gsum byas nas lhag pa
T02D3140:56b-33: dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar byas pa'i
T02D3140:56b-35: phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba'i
T02D3140:56b-36: grangs bzhin du nub sgo la sogs pa bzhir gnas
T02D3140:56b-37: pas shar sgo la sogs pa bzhi aom badzrod gha
T02D3140:56b-38: ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes
T02D3140:56b-39: pa'i sngags kyis phye bar bsams te /
T02D3140:56b-40: aom sa ma ya pra be sha mi zhes brjod
T02D3140:56b-41: nas slar phreng ba gar byed cing blangs la rang
T02D3140:56b-42: gi ngo bo la bcings te /
T02D3140:56b-44: sems can thams cad la dngos grub thams cad kyi bka' drin stsol cig ces gsol ba btab nas /
T02D3140:56b-45: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3140:56b-46: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa las phyi rol dbang
T02D3140:57a-0: po la sogs pa rnams su go rims @57a *
T02D3140:57a-1: // bzhin du dkar po dang ser skya dang nag po dang dud kha dang /
T02D3140:57a-2: dmar po dang khra bo dang ser po dang ljang
T02D3140:57a-3: gu'i ba dan brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la
T02D3140:57a-4: phul nas shar la sogs par gzug par bya'o zhes
T02D3140:57a-5: pa ni shes rab bskyangs kyis so //
T02D3140:57a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du /
T02D3140:57a-7: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D3140:57a-8: ba dan brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3140:57a-11: de'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi ba dan ni mer dgod par bya'o //
T02D3140:57a-13: de'i rigs can rnams kyi bden bral du'o ;
T02D3140:57a-14: / snang ba mtha' yas dang de'i rigs las byung ba rnams kyi rlung du'o //
T02D3140:57a-15: don yod grub pa dang de'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi dbang ldan du'o //
T02D3140:57a-17: de'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi ni rang rang gi phyogs su'o zhes pa ni kha cig go //
T02D3140:57a-22: mes po'i ser po ste dbang por ro //
T02D3140:57a-25: bden bral gyi dud kha rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs su'o //
T02D3140:57a-26: nub du chu lha'i dkar po dang /
T02D3140:57a-27: sa'i lha mo'i ser po dang /
T02D3140:57a-28: thags bzangs ris kyi nag po'o //
T02D3140:57a-29: rlung du rlung lha'i ljang gu'o //
T02D3140:57a-30: byang du lus ngan po'i ser po dang /
T02D3140:57a-32: dbang ldan du dbang ldan gyi dkar po'o //
T02D3140:57a-33: de ltar ba dan bco lnga ni phyogs kyi bdag po rnams la mnyes par bya ba'i ched du'o //
T02D3140:57a-34: mi 'byor na nus pa ji lta bar ba dan rnams dbul bar bya'o ;
T02D3140:57a-35: / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3140:57a-36: de nas der rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram /
T02D3140:57a-37: ras bris la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram /
T02D3140:57a-38: yid kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du byas pa der ji
T02D3140:57a-39: ltar brjod pa'i mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du
T02D3140:57a-40: 'gro bas sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rab gnas kyang
T02D3140:57a-41: slob ma rab tu gnas pa bzhin bya'o //
T02D3140:57a-42: de la dkyil 'khor gzhan du yang sngar brjod pa'i
T02D3140:57a-43: cho gas dang po bum pa lhag par gnas pa
T02D3140:57a-44: dang / dgod pa dag byas nas sku gzugs la
T02D3140:57a-45: sogs pa stong pa nyid du bsams pa'i rjes la
T02D3140:57a-46: sa bon la sogs pa las rdzogs pa'am /
T02D3140:57b-0: @57b skad cig gis kyang rung ste dam tshig sems
T02D3140:57b-1: dpa'i ngo bo snying ga'i sa bon dang bcas pa
T02D3140:57b-2: bsams nas gos gsar pa dmar po la sogs pas
T02D3140:57b-3: g-yogs shing me tog dang ldan par byas nas de'i
T02D3140:57b-4: me tog gi phreng ba blangs te sku gzugs la
T02D3140:57b-5: sogs pa dang lhan cig yon bdag slob ma bzhin
T02D3140:57b-6: du rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams
T02D3140:57b-7: kyang gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug par
T02D3140:57b-8: bya'o // slob dpon gyis kyang sku gzugs la sogs
T02D3140:57b-9: pa'i lha'i mtshan ma'am de'i rigs kyi bdag po'i mtshan
T02D3140:57b-10: ma la me tog dbul du gzhug go //
T02D3140:57b-11: yang na me tog dor ba med pa nyid du
T02D3140:57b-12: sku gzugs la sogs pa dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid
T02D3140:57b-13: kyis gzhug pa'o // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang
T02D3140:57b-14: pa'i phyi ngos shar gyi phyogs su'am der skabs med
T02D3140:57b-15: na dbang ldan du ha cang mi ring ba'i yid
T02D3140:57b-16: du 'ong ba'i gnas su khrus kyi stegs bu gru
T02D3140:57b-17: bzhi ba dbangs su khru gnyis pa'o //
T02D3140:57b-18: yang na srid du khru brgyad pa de'i phyed du
T02D3140:57b-19: mtho ba dang yang na srid du khru gnyis pa
T02D3140:57b-20: de'i phyed du mtho ba ste /
T02D3140:57b-21: sa sel la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i
T02D3140:57b-22: sa las byas pa'am so phag la sogs pas byas
T02D3140:57b-23: pa'am / de med na ni ji ltar rnyed pa'am /
T02D3140:57b-24: ji ltar gnas pa'i sa gzhi yang rung ste /
T02D3140:57b-25: 'bras btags pa'i khu ba la sogs pas bris pa'i
T02D3140:57b-26: stegs bu phyogs dang mtshams su bum pa brgyad bzhag
T02D3140:57b-27: la / shin tu 'jam pa bdud rtsi dang bcas
T02D3140:57b-28: pa'i rnam lnga la sogs pas byugs pa bla re
T02D3140:57b-29: la / dang / gdugs dkar po dang /
T02D3140:57b-35: rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas sam ji ltar rnyed
T02D3140:57b-36: pas kyang rung ste yid du 'ong bar byas nas
T02D3140:57b-37: / tshes dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang yud tsam la sogs pa bzang ba la khrus byas shing /
T02D3140:57b-43: sor gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa'am /
T02D3140:57b-44: ji ltar rnyed pas brgyan pa'i slob dpon rdo rje
T02D3140:57b-45: sems dpa'i sku rig ma dang ldan pas stegs bu
T02D3140:57b-46: de'i dbus su sgo nub tu bstan pa'i re kh'a
T02D3140:57b-47: gru bzhi pa cig gis bskor ba'i sna tshogs padma
T02D3140:57b-48: rdul tshon nas 'bras btags pa'i khu ba la sogs
T02D3140:58a-0: yang na rta babs med pa'i sgo nub tu bstan pa'i @58a * //
T02D3140:58a-1: gru bzhi pa'i dbus su chud pa'am /
T02D3140:58a-2: yang na nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad gru bzhi pa /
T02D3140:58a-6: shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la 'khor lo dang /
T02D3140:58a-10: mtshams rnams su yum bzhi'i mtshan ma dang /
T02D3140:58a-11: dbus su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni //
T02D3140:58a-13: 'bring dang rgyas pa'i dbye bas khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gsum yin no //
T02D3140:58a-14: de'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa'i
T02D3140:58a-15: shing stan nam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bris pa'i ras
T02D3140:58a-16: la sogs pas g-yogs pa'i seng ge'i gdan khrus kyi
T02D3140:58a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi padma'i steng du 'jog par mos pas
T02D3140:58a-18: bzhag nas sam / khrus kyi dkyil 'khor med par yang de ltar dang /

T02D3140:58a-26: ma bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms

T02D3140:58a-28: der ni khrus kyi stegs bu dgos pa med do //

T02D3140:64b-16: der ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa cho ga bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3140:64b-17: de bzhin du ji ltar rigs par bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par yang ngo //
T02D3140:64b-18: de nas rig pa'i bdag po ni sngags rnams la dang /
T02D3140:64b-19: bsgrub bya ni rang gi ming la bcug nas rig pa spyi bo'i bu gnas /
T02D3140:64b-20: kha nas bcug ste rdo rje'i lam nas byung ba
T02D3140:64b-21: lha mo'i padmar zhugs pa la rang gi snying ga'i
T02D3140:64b-22: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i de bzhin
T02D3140:64b-23: gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs pas dbang bskur te /
T02D3140:64b-24: phyir byung ba rnams la dbang bskur pa'i bum pa'i chus gtor ro //
T02D3140:64b-25: yang dag par mchod pa'i rig pa'i bdag po'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
T02D3140:64b-26: rig pa'i khyad par la ni kha cig tu bsgom
T02D3140:64b-27: pa'i khyad par nyung du ni man ngag gi snye
T02D3140:64b-29: rig pa rab tu gnas pa'o//
T02D3140:64b-30: / slob dpon rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su rang
T02D3140:64b-31: gi lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo rnams rdo rje
T02D3140:64b-32: rtse lnga pa'i ngo bor skad cig gis bsgoms pa
T02D3140:64b-33: la yi ge a'a: las skyes pa'i nyi ma a'a:
T02D3140:64b-34: sa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D3140:64b-35: lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo rnams padma'i 'dab ma'i
T02D3140:64b-36: rnam par skad cig gis bsams pa la aa las
T02D3140:64b-37: skyes pa'i zla ba des byin gyis brlabs pa bsgoms
T02D3140:64b-38: nas / de dag gi dbus su bzung ba'i phreng
T02D3140:64b-39: ba'i thag pa'i dbus kyi skud pa rdo rje sems
T02D3140:64b-41: phyogs dang mtshams kyi skud pa brgyad phyag na padma dang /
T02D3140:65a-5: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D3140:65a-6: sa'i snying po'i bdag nyid du dang /
T02D3140:65a-7: phreng rdog rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D3140:65a-8: mdo 'dzin ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs
T02D3140:65a-9: pa'i chos kyi phung po'i mchod rten du skad cig
T02D3140:65a-10: gis bsams nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
T02D3140:65a-11: gyis bkug pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D3140:65a-12: rnams rang nyid ji lta ba la bcug ste /
T02D3140:65a-13: aa gkha ru k'a ru nu ru aa so hi
T02D3140:65a-14: sa manta bi sv'a ruga ni aa aa sam khu
T02D3140:65a-15: aa lig ku si dza dza ai tad ta bi
T02D3140:65a-16: s'a ru ; aom pa de pa de ma h'a
T02D3140:65a-17: dzny'a na sarba bu ddha ma ham bha be h'um
T02D3140:65a-18: h'um h'um ho ho ho aa kham sv'a h'a /
T02D3140:65a-19: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D3140:65a-20: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur zhing mchod par bya'o //
T02D3140:65a-21: phreng ba rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D3140:65a-22: mdor bsdus pa ni phreng ba la gsung rdo rje
T02D3140:65a-23: bsgoms nas ye shes sems dpa' dang gcig tu byas
T02D3140:65a-24: te de'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa las phreng ba'i
T02D3140:65a-26: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te mchod nas gsung rdo rje'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3140:65a-27: phreng ba rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D3140:65a-28: 'di ni sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3140:65a-30: // / yon bdag la nus pa yod na chu 'gram
T02D3140:65a-31: du gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D3140:65a-32: bris te de'i 'gram du 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi
T02D3140:65a-33: rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gtor ma rnams rdzing la
T02D3140:65a-34: sogs pa'i phyogs su btang nas chu stong par gyur
T02D3140:65a-35: par bsams te / bhr'um las skyes pa'i 'khor lo
T02D3140:65a-36: dang bhr'um las grub pa'i rnam par snang mdzad spyan
T02D3140:65a-37: ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa yongs su gyur pa
T02D3140:65a-38: las rdo rje chu lha dkar po mi'i gdong ba
T02D3140:65a-40: lag pa g-yon pas klu'i zhags pa bzung bas mdzes ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D3140:65a-41: g-yas pa 'gying ba dang bcas pas autpala sngon po bsnams pa /
T02D3140:65a-42: lte ba'i 'og na sbrul gyi rnam pa'i dam tshig
T02D3140:65a-43: sems dpa' bsgoms nas de la rang gi snying ga'i
T02D3140:65a-44: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i rnam par
T02D3140:65a-45: snang mdzad zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang /
T02D3140:65a-46: mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3140:65b-0: aom badzras ma ya @65b stvam zhes brjod nas bcug
T02D3140:65b-1: ste dbang bskur la me tog la sogs pas mchod
T02D3140:65b-2: nas / de yongs su gyur cing gzugs brnyan dang
T02D3140:65b-3: ldan pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin dri
T02D3140:65b-4: nas / zhim pa dang / ro zhim pa dang /
T02D3140:65b-9: gre ba dang lto ba la mi gnod pa ste /
T02D3140:65b-10: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu dbang chen gyi
T02D3140:65b-11: gting la thug par klu rigs brgyad kyi gnas rlabs
T02D3140:65b-12: kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa kun nas bsgom par
T02D3140:65b-13: bya'o // de la yang chu'i mthil du bzo byas
T02D3140:65b-14: pa'i klu brgyad skad cig gis dam tshig sems dpa'i
T02D3140:65b-15: ngo bo snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3140:65b-16: bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa
T02D3140:65b-18: rdzing der dbus su mchod sdong gi shing zabs las tshad nyis 'gyur ram /
T02D3140:65b-19: dpangs dang mnyam pa yang rung ste /
T02D3140:65b-20: de ltar sems dpa' gnyis kyi bdag nyid can chu
T02D3140:65b-21: lha'i gzugs brnyan dang ldan pa'i rtse mo can btsugs
T02D3140:65b-22: pa'i drung du'o // mchod sdong gi shing dang bral ba'i chu'i rten gyi dbus su yang ngo //
T02D3140:65b-23: de la shar du mtha' yas gser las byas pa dang /
T02D3140:65b-24: lhor ra gan las byas pa'i padma dang /
T02D3140:65b-25: nub tu zangs kyi rang bzhin 'jog po dang /
T02D3140:65b-26: byang du dngul dag pa'i rang bzhin las nor rgyas dang ;
T02D3140:65b-27: dbang ldan du zha nye dkar po las bsgrubs pa'i padma chen po dang /
T02D3140:65b-28: mer zha nye'i rang bzhin gyi dud skyong dang /
T02D3140:65b-29: bden bral du khar ba las byas pa'i karko ta dang /
T02D3140:65b-30: rlung du lcags las byas pa'i rigs ldan no //
T02D3140:65b-31: mchod sdong med na ni dbus su rdo rje chu lha shel las byas pa'o//
T02D3140:65b-32: de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang 'o ma dang ga
T02D3140:65b-33: pu ra la sogs pa chu lha la sogs pa
T02D3140:65b-34: la gtor te de rnams la me tog la sogs
T02D3140:65b-35: pas mchod la 'byor na rgyas pa'i don du sbyin
T02D3140:65b-36: sreg byas nas ba lang gi lci ba byugs par
T02D3140:65b-37: 'dug ste dri dkar pos mandala byas nas /
T02D3140:65b-38: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3140:65b-39: bkug pa'i mandala la gnas pa'i padma'i lte ba la
T02D3140:65b-41: shar gyi 'dab ma la mtha' yas dang /
T02D3140:65b-42: lhor padma dang nub tu 'jog po dang /
T02D3140:65b-44: dbang ldan du padma chen po dang /
T02D3140:65b-46: bden bral du karko ta dang //
T02D3140:66a-0: @66a * // phyi rol kun du klu thams cad bsams nas /
T02D3140:66a-1: aom a'a: badzra ba ru n'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3140:66a-2: aom a'a: aa nand'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3140:66a-3: de ltar rang gi ming bcug pa'i sngags rnams kyis
T02D3140:66a-4: me tog dkar pos mchod de lag pa g-yon pa
T02D3140:66a-5: gdengs ka'i tshul du lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste
T02D3140:66a-6: / aom aa nanda p'a su ki taksha ka ka
T02D3140:66a-7: rko ta ka padma ma h'a padma sham kh'a b'a
T02D3140:66a-8: la ku li ka de ba ti ma h'a de
T02D3140:66a-9: / ba ti / so ma shi khi ma h'a shi khi /
T02D3140:66a-10: danda dha ra ma h'a danda dha ra aa pa
T02D3140:66a-11: l'a la hu lunda nanda au pa nanda s'a ga
T02D3140:66a-12: ra ma h'a s'a ga ra ta pa ta ma
T02D3140:66a-17: su r'u pa ma h'a su r'u pa /
T02D3140:66a-18: bha ta hi ka ma ho da da shi la ma h'a shi li li aom bhaksha bha ksha /
T02D3140:66a-19: a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha ma h'a n'a ga aa dhi pa ti sarba bhurbhu ba phrum phrum sv'a h'a /
T02D3140:66a-20: zhes pa klu'i gtor ma'i sngags 'don zhing 'o ma'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3140:66a-21: de nas yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i don du gsol ba btab ste /
T02D3140:66a-22: yi ge brgya pa bton nas bzod par gsol te /
T02D3140:66a-23: byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'o ma'i gtor ma re kham phor rnams su phyogs brgyad rnams su dbul lo //
T02D3140:66a-24: de'i phyi ngos su'ang gtor ro //
T02D3140:66a-25: gzhon nu ma rnams kyang tshim par bya'o //
T02D3140:66a-27: khron pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3140:66a-28: aa mra'i tshal dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i chog la /
T02D3140:66a-29: phyogs su gtor ma byin nas bdag nyid rnam par
T02D3140:66a-30: snang mdzad kyis shing gi gtso bo stong pa nyid
T02D3140:66a-31: kyi rjes la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bor
T02D3140:66a-32: bsams nas der rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes
T02D3140:66a-33: sems dpa' mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3140:66a-34: bas bcug nas / bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te
T02D3140:66a-35: de yongs su gyur pa'i shing de dang de nyid
T02D3140:66a-36: kyi tshe shing gzhan rnams kyang de yongs su gyur
T02D3140:66a-37: bas bcug nas / par mos te / shing gi
T02D3140:66a-38: gtso bo dang de la byin gyis brlab pa'i lha'i
T02D3140:66a-39: me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D3140:66a-40: 'bras bu la sogs pas mchog tu phan 'dogs pa'i
T02D3140:66a-41: skyed mos tshal la sogs pa yun ring du gnas
T02D3140:66a-42: pa'i phyir gsol ba btab nas phyogs kyi gtor ma
T02D3140:66a-43: rnams dbul lo // skyed mos tshal la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3140:66a-45: // / brjod pa'i cho ga 'di dag nyid la thams
T02D3140:66b-0: cad du las @66b gang la sngags ma brjod pa
T02D3140:66b-1: der ni las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas so zhes
T02D3140:66b-2: pa ni kha bskang bar bya ba'o //
T02D3140:66b-3: de nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram dkyil 'khor gzhan yang rung ste /
T02D3140:66b-4: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas dang po bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D3140:66b-6: nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02D3140:66b-7: lhag gnas byas pa'i slob ma rnams las legs par
T02D3140:66b-8: btags pa nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral
T02D3140:66b-9: ba / dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i bslab pa la
T02D3140:66b-10: gnas pa legs par thos pa la sogs pas yongs
T02D3140:66b-11: ba / su sbyangs pa / gus pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3140:66b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngom pa bzung ba'i nus pa dang ldan na rigs dang yon tan dang /
T02D3140:66b-13: gzugs dang bral ba rnams kyang lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D3140:66b-14: gal te de dag kyang dad pas rdo rje sems
T02D3140:66b-15: dpa'i sngom pa shin tu don du gnyer zhing rdo
T02D3140:66b-16: rje theg pa la ston pa gzhan mi tshol bar
T02D3140:66b-17: gyur na'o / de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shing phyed dang bzhi brgya par yang /
T02D3140:66b-18: gzugs ngan yongs su med pa dang //
T02D3140:66b-19: dman pa'ang lhag par gnas bya ste //
T02D3140:66b-20: 'khor ni bzhi po rnams la yang //
T02D3140:66b-21: dkyil 'khor dag tu cho ga gnang //
T02D3140:66b-22: rang rang bslab pa legs par ldan //
T02D3140:66b-23: theg chen la dga'i bdag nyid can ;
T02D3140:66b-29: cho ga ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D3140:66b-30: ldan pa ni de lhur byed pa'o //
T02D3140:66b-31: theg chen la dga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3140:66b-32: zhes pa 'dis ni 'gal ba spangs pa'i theg pa
T02D3140:66b-33: 'di la yid kyi las gtso bo nyid du ston
T02D3140:66b-34: par byed do // bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyi kha na mtho ba'i las nyid la yang /
T02D3140:66b-35: kun slong gi khyad par las ltung bar mi 'gyur bar mang du gsungs so //
T02D3140:66b-36: kho bos kyang man ngag gi snyem la sogs par rnam par bkrol lo //
T02D3140:66b-38: snying brtser ldan zhing byams phyir dang //
T02D3140:66b-39: sems dge ba la ltung ba med //
T02D3140:66b-41: snying rje ldan zhing don mthong bas //
T02D3140:66b-42: bkag pa yang ni gnang ba yin //
T02D3140:66b-44: gang zhig yang bsod nams bsags pa mang du thos pa la sogs pas /
T02D3140:66b-45: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /
T02D3140:67a-1: lta bu dang stong pa nyid du ro gcig par
T02D3140:67a-2: shin tu brtan par lhag par mos par byed pa
T02D3140:67a-3: de la ni dge slong dang /
T02D3140:67a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngom pa dag dang 'gal ba'i dri ma yang ga la yod /
T02D3140:67a-5: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes gsungs te /
T02D3140:67a-6: 'di ni nges par khas blangs dgos so //
T02D3140:67a-7: gzhan du na dus mtshungs par gnyis ka ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D3140:67a-8: dge slong gi nyams su myong ba de'i sbyor ba'i
T02D3140:67a-9: bde ba'i bag chags sad pas rmi lam du mthong
T02D3140:67a-10: na rmi lam du mthong ba'i phyi rol gyi phyag
T02D3140:67a-11: rgya la dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba'i mthar thug
T02D3140:67a-12: par nyams su myong na yang ltung ba med do
T02D3140:67a-13: zhes 'dul bar bstan pa de rtogs par bya'o //
T02D3140:67a-14: gal te phyogs kyi bye brag skye bo ngan pa'i spyod yul du gyur na /
T02D3140:67a-15: de'i tshe de la yang ye shes kyi phyag rgyas
T02D3140:67a-16: gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang sbyin
T02D3140:67a-17: par bya'o // skye bo ngan pa med na ni las kyi phyag rgya kho nas so //
T02D3140:67a-18: de kho na nyid la mos pa mi brtan pa'i
T02D3140:67a-19: dge slong la ni dad pa dang ldan yang phyi'i
T02D3140:67a-20: shes rab ma'i dbang bzung ba bkag ste /
T02D3140:67a-21: gzhan du sngom pa lnga ma nyams pas de don med pa chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D3140:67a-22: gal te yang bla ma bsgom pa la brtan par
T02D3140:67a-23: gyur na de'i tshe de la yang des gtad pa'i
T02D3140:67a-24: ye shes kyi phyag rgya mas shes rab ye shes
T02D3140:67a-26: blangs pa la yang tshangs par spyod pa dang bral ba'i dogs pa yang med de /
T02D3140:67a-27: lus kyi las med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3140:67a-28: de yang sngar khyim pa yin na nyams su myong
T02D3140:67a-29: ba'i bde ba dran du bcug pas dga' ba la
T02D3140:67a-30: sogs pa'i dbye ba bstan par bya'o //
T02D3140:67a-31: bla ma yang dge slong du gyur pa na gsang ba'i dbang la sogs pa ster ba'i tshe /
T02D3140:67a-32: brjod pa thams cad mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D3140:67a-33: ha cang spros pas chog go //
T02D3140:67a-34: skabs su babs pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D3140:67a-35: de la slob ma gcig gam gnyis sam mang po
T02D3140:67a-36: mandala byas nas pus mo sa la btsugs te me
T02D3140:67a-37: tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba rnams la
T02D3140:67a-38: 'jig rten 'di nyid kyi mngon par mtho ba don
T02D3140:67a-40: 'jig rten pha rol tu mngon par mtho ba'i ched du yang ma yin gyi /
T02D3140:67a-41: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum gyi phun
T02D3140:67a-42: sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor
T02D3140:67b-1: de lta na ni mngon par mtho ba gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrags nas /
T02D3140:67b-2: kha nas rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D3140:67b-3: rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon nas shes rab kyi padma'i
T02D3140:67b-4: lam la gnas pa rnams la snying ga'i sa bon
T02D3140:67b-5: gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i shes rab dang bcas
T02D3140:67b-6: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kha nas zhugs shing zhu
T02D3140:67b-7: bar gyur pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms nas
T02D3140:67b-8: / dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhag ste /
T02D3140:67b-9: 'jug par gsol ba 'debs su gzhug par bya ste /
T02D3140:67b-10: skye rga 'chi ba na kra yi //
T02D3140:67b-11: chu srin la sogs 'jigs rung ba //
T02D3140:67b-12: srid pa'i mtsho las bdag sgrol mdzod //
T02D3140:67b-13: dga' chen ston pa khyod gcig pu //
T02D3140:67b-14: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D3140:67b-15: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D3140:67b-16: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D3140:67b-17: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3140:67b-18: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D3140:67b-19: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3140:67b-20: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D3140:67b-21: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D3140:67b-22: zhes brjod du gzhug cing ngo //
T02D3140:67b-23: dga' chen zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3140:67b-28: kha cig ni dang por gso sbyong bzung ba rnams la zhes so //
T02D3140:67b-29: de nas slob ma gcig gtso bor bya ste /
T02D3140:67b-30: bu tshur shog cig theg chen po //
T02D3140:67b-31: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02D3140:67b-32: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D3140:67b-33: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D3140:67b-34: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D3140:67b-35: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D3140:67b-36: rdo rje sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis //
T02D3140:67b-37: ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes //
